Title: Establishes the crime of homicide by sale of an opiate controlled substance
Summary: Establishes the crime of homicide by sale of an opiate controlled substance; makes such crime a class A-1 felony.
LawCode: Amd ยง220.00, add ยง125.24, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to enacting "Laree's law"
